description: Interactive single-page web application displaying ocean research organizations on a world map. Features include real-time CSV data loading, Mapbox GL JS integration, search functionality with side panel results, responsive design, and detailed organization popups. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite for optimal performance and embeddability.

file_descriptions.package.json: NPM configuration with dependencies for React, TypeScript, Vite, TailwindCSS, Mapbox GL JS, Papa Parse for CSV parsing, and React Router DOM
file_descriptions.tsconfig.json: TypeScript configuration optimized for React with strict mode, ES2020 target, and proper module resolution
file_descriptions.vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin and environment variable handling for Mapbox token
file_descriptions.tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors and responsive breakpoints for map layout
file_descriptions.postcss.config.js: PostCSS configuration for TailwindCSS processing with autoprefixer
file_descriptions.index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta for mobile responsiveness and root div for React mounting
file_descriptions..gitignore: Git ignore file excluding node_modules, dist, .env files, and IDE configurations
file_descriptions..env.example: Environment variable template showing required VITE_MAPBOX_TOKEN format
file_descriptions.src/main.tsx: React application entry point that renders App component with strict mode
file_descriptions.src/App.tsx: Main application component with router setup and global error boundary
file_descriptions.src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind directives and custom CSS for Mapbox GL JS integration
file_descriptions.src/utils/types.ts: TypeScript interfaces for organization data, CSV parsing, map state, and search functionality
file_descriptions.src/utils/csvParser.ts: CSV parsing utilities using Papa Parse to transform Google Sheets data into typed organization objects
file_descriptions.src/utils/mapUtils.ts: Mapbox utility functions for coordinate validation, marker creation, and map bounds calculation
file_descriptions.src/utils/searchUtils.ts: Search functionality utilities for filtering organizations by text across all fields
file_descriptions.src/hooks/useOrganizations.ts: Custom hook for fetching and managing organization data from CSV URL with error handling
file_descriptions.src/hooks/useMapbox.ts: Custom hook for Mapbox GL JS initialization, marker management, and map interactions
file_descriptions.src/hooks/useSearch.ts: Custom hook for search state management and result filtering with debouncing
file_descriptions.src/components/OrganizationPopup.tsx: Popup component displaying detailed organization information when marker is clicked
file_descriptions.src/components/OrganizationCard.tsx: Card component for search results with styled layout matching requirements
file_descriptions.src/components/SearchInput.tsx: Search input component with real-time filtering and clear functionality
file_descriptions.src/components/SearchResults.tsx: Side panel component displaying filtered organization cards with responsive layout
file_descriptions.src/components/WorldMap.tsx: Main map component integrating Mapbox GL JS with markers, popups, and responsive design
file_descriptions.src/pages/MapPage.tsx: Main page component combining map, search input, and results panel with responsive layout
